spec.brief: minimum spanning tree based on the Prim algorithm

parameters.name: T
parameters.description: date type of pagerank, double or float

parameters.name: MAXVERTEX
parameters.description: CSC/CSR data vertex(offset) array maxsize

parameters.name: MAXEDGE
parameters.description: CSC/CSR data edge(indice) array maxsize

parameters.name: LOG2UNROLL
parameters.description: log2 of unroll number, due to DDR limit, best LOG2UNROLL is 3

parameters.name: WIDTHOR
parameters.description: order array bandwidth, it's 256 in our case

parameters.name: LOG2CACHEDEPTH
parameters.description: log2(cache depth), the onchip memory for cache is 512 bit x CACHEDEPTH (512 bit x 2^LOG2CACHEDEPTH)

parameters.name: LOG2DATAPERCACHELINECORE
parameters.description: param for module pageRankCore, log2 of number of data in one 512bit (64 byte), for double, it's log2(64/sizeof(double)) = 3, for float, it's log2(64/sizeof(float)) = 4

parameters.name: LOG2DATAPERCACHELINEDEGREE
parameters.description: param for module calduDegree, log2 of number of data in one 512bit (64 byte), for double, it's log2(64/sizeof(double)) = 3, for float, it's log2(64/sizeof(float)) = 4

parameters.name: RAMTYPE
parameters.description: flag to tell use URAM LUTRAM or BRAM, 0 : LUTRAM, 1 : URAM, 2 : BRAM

spec.brief: twoHop this API can find the how many 2-hop pathes between two vertices. The input graph is the matrix in CSR format. And a list of src and destination pairs whose 2-hop pathes will be counted.
